Description: Oakley Juliet Original 5000 X Men Ruby Sunglasses With Non Original Box And Coin. Condition is Pre-owned. Frames are in good condition which my definition is there are signs of use but nothing sever. There are some scratches and small dings on the frames but again... nothing sever. The nose bridge is NOT perfectly tight but is not loose enough you could not wear these but why would you wear these? Lenses are Oakley Ruby OEM lenses and are in new condition. I sought out the same tint as these were issued in with the more orange Hue for originality purposes when replacing for display. All Rubbers are OEM Juliet Oakley rubbers in new condition. As you can tell the box and coin do not match the glasses in serial. I picked the box up here on Ebay to at least give it a box it is worth of. The coin is the more desirable engraved Juliet coin. If you send an offer and are declined please don't message me with your offer that was declined. Make a good offer because I check Ebay only in the morning and night some days and auto accept is on.... No I will not pay shipping so I will not negotiate that in a deal.
